parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ error: 'unauthorized', status: 401, message: 'Invalid or expired admin token' }) }}

parameters.query:
SELECT 
  u.id,
  u.telegram_id,
  u.username,
  u.first_name,
  u.last_name,
  u.created_at,
  u.last_login_at,
  COUNT(DISTINCT c.id) as chats_count,
  COUNT(DISTINCT uc.company_id) as companies_count,
  json_agg(DISTINCT jsonb_build_object('company_id', uc.company_id, 'role', uc.role)) FILTER (WHERE uc.company_id IS NOT NULL) as companies
FROM users u
LEFT JOIN chats c ON u.id = c.user_id
LEFT JOIN user_companies uc ON u.id = uc.user_id
WHERE ($1::text IS NULL OR u.username ILIKE '%' || $1 || '%' OR u.first_name ILIKE '%' || $1 || '%' OR u.last_name ILIKE '%' || $1 || '%')
GROUP BY u.id, u.telegram_id, u.username, u.first_name, u.last_name, u.created_at, u.last_login_at
ORDER BY u.created_at DESC
LIMIT $2 OFFSET $3;
